thig2.2:1.2: are the path for attaining Nibb훮na.
thig2.2:1.3: All of them have been cultivated by me,
thig2.2:2.1: I have seen the Blessed One,
thig2.2:2.2: indeed this is my last body.
thig2.2:2.4: there is no coming back to any state of being."
thig2.2:3.1: Thus Jent훮 the Elder spoke these verses.
